Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>net.revelc.code</groupId>
  <artifactId>revelc</artifactId>
  <version>1</version>
  <type>pom</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'net.revelc.code:revelc:pom:1'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="net.revelc.code" name="revelc" rev="1">
  <artifact name="revelc" type="pom" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='net.revelc.code', module='revelc', version='1')
)

Grails

compile 'net.revelc.code:revelc:1'

Leiningen

[net.revelc.code/revelc "1"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "net.revelc.code" % "revelc" % "1"
